Hi, I'm Kirby.

I am a Web Developer, Musician, and Audio Professional seeking new challenges and a creative work environment. Please feel free to visit my linked projects below and view source code on my Github. I am interested in full-time, part-time, or freelance work.

In the past, I've been a teacher, touring musician, and live sound engineer.

I am currently enrolled in the NuCamp Front End Development Bootcamp.
